adrift.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a boat that is adrift is not fastened to anything or controlled by anyone
adrift.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Several of the lifeboats were still afloat a month after being cast adrift.
adrift.translation[0].definitions[1].def: someone who is adrift is confused about what to do in their life
adrift.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: a young woman adrift in London
